hero.title: Is your rent in Paris legal?
hero.subtitle: Enter your rental information. We compare it to the official legal rent caps in Paris.
hero.note: No automatic storage. Indicative calculation based on official regulations.

benefits.title: What this site does for you

instant.title: Instant check
instant.text: We compare your rent to the legal rent caps in Paris for your type of dwelling.

letter.title: Letter ready to send
letter.text: If your rent is above the cap, we suggest an email or letter template to ask for compliance.

help.title: Human support
help.text: You can contact us and send your lease to get more personalised help.

step1.title: You enter your details
step1.text: Address, floor area, rent, furnished or unfurnished.

step2.title: We check the legal cap
step2.text: We calculate the applicable maximum reference rent for your dwelling.

step3.title: You act with confidence
step3.text: You get a letter ready to send to your landlord.

q1.title: Is this an official service?
q1.text: No, this is an independent tool. Calculations are based on official regulations but do not replace legal advice.

q2.title: Is it free?
q2.text: Yes, the check and letter template are free. Personalised support may be handled separately if needed.

q3.title: What do you do with my data?
q3.text: By default, nothing is stored. If you contact us, your data is used only to process your request.
